title: PLZ HELP THE GAME IS NOT WORKING :(

replies.body: We've noticed that EU players have been having some weird [**login issues**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu) and troubles when trying to reconnect. The steps in that sticky post have been able to help a number of players, but definitely hit me back up if that doesn't help!
